messages.text:
I think sendfile on FreeBSD is still messed up.  http://build.golang.org/ shows
a lot of what looks like corruption in file serving from disk files.


On Wed, Jun 27, 2012 at 2:02 PM, <rsc@golang.org> wrote:

> *** Submitted as
> http://code.google.com/p/go/**source/detail?r=84fd191ce289<http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=84fd191ce289>***
